mapper.insert: insert into member values ( #{ memberId }, #{ password }, #{ name }, #{ email }, #{ phone }, #{ addr }, #{ addrDetail }, #{ postCode }, #{ memberRole }, default, default )
mapper.select: select * from member where member_id = #{ memberId }
mapper.delete: delete from member where member_id = #{ memberId }
mapper.update: update member set email = #{ email }, phone = #{ phone }, addr = #{ addr }, addr_detail = #{ addrDetail }, post_code = #{ postCode } where member_id = #{ memberId }
